short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Enter a new world with Waifu Bliss – anime images and vibrant colorful backgrounds in every new tab!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Dive into the world of Waifu Bliss – every new anime girl image and vibrant background in each tab will make your browser unique. Soothing colors will calm your eyes, while subtle image animations add life. The collection will be regularly updated with new and stunning waifu artworks for your enjoyment!
